channel.title: oil on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in oil on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Home Remedies from South India: Miscellaneous
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Eye care, Coughs, Digestive disorders, Head aches, and Skin Careamong other topics.

item.title: Buses
item.description: From October 2008 The Bus 1 I stand in the bus The crowd sways behind me My dupatta catches the flow But oh! Now the flow chokes me.
